33 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::GetLinePointsInDriveDirection(vector<LineValidationTable> &l,vector<LineValidationTable> &m,vector<LineValidationTable> &r)
34 {
35 
36  left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.clear();
37  mid_line_points_in_drive_direction_.clear();
38  right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.clear();
39 
40  ExtractLinePointsInDriveDirection(left_line_validation_table_, left_line_points_in_drive_direction_ );
41  ExtractLinePointsInDriveDirection(mid_line_validation_table_, mid_line_points_in_drive_direction_ );
42  ExtractLinePointsInDriveDirection(right_line_validation_table_,right_line_points_in_drive_direction_ );
43 
44 
45  l = left_line_points_in_drive_direction_;
46  m = mid_line_points_in_drive_direction_;
47  r = right_line_points_in_drive_direction_;
48 }

56 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::SearchParkingArea(Mat &rgb)
57 {
58  components_stats_.release();
59  components_centroids_.release();
60  labeled_image_.release();
61  components_count_ = connectedComponentsWithStats(current_image_, labeled_image_, components_stats_, components_centroids_, kConnectionCount_, CV_32S);
62 
63  Mat under_max_size_components_truth_table = components_stats_.col(COMPONENT_SIZE_COLUMN)<1280*100;
64  Mat over_min_size_components_truth_table = components_stats_.col(COMPONENT_SIZE_COLUMN)>30000;
65 
66 
67  under_max_size_components_truth_table.convertTo(under_max_size_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
68  over_min_size_components_truth_table.convertTo(over_min_size_components_truth_table, CV_8UC1);
69 
70  for (int id = 0; id < components_count_; id++)
71  {
72  if (under_max_size_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0)&&
73  over_min_size_components_truth_table.at<uchar>(id, 0))
74  {
75 
76  int component_centroid_x = components_centroids_.at<float>(id,CENTROIDS_X_COLUMN);
77  int component_centroid_y = components_centroids_.at<float>(id,CENTROIDS_Y_COLUMN);
78  int component_roi_x = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_X_COLUMN);
79  int component_roi_y = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_Y_COLUMN);
80  int component_roi_width = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_WIDTH_COLUMN);
81  int component_roi_height = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_HEIGHT_COLUMN);
82  int component_size = components_stats_.at<int>(id,COMPONENT_SIZE_COLUMN);
83 
84 
85  cout <<component_centroid_x << endl;
86  cout <<component_centroid_y << endl;
87  cout <<component_roi_x << endl;
88  cout <<component_roi_y << endl;
89  cout <<component_roi_width << endl;
90  cout <<component_roi_height << endl;
91  cout <<component_size << endl;
92  cout <<"#######################" << endl;
93 
94 
95  rectangle(rgb, Rect(component_roi_x,component_roi_y,component_roi_width,component_roi_height), Scalar(0, 0, 255), 1, 8 );
96 
97  }
98  }
99 
100 
101  //cout << components_stats_ << endl;
102 
103  //components_centroids_.at<float>(id,CENTROIDS_X_COLUMN);
104 
105  //int component_roi_x = components_stats_.at<int>(id,ROI_X_COLUMN);

109 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::SearchCrossRoad(Mat &rgb)
110 {
111 
112  bool mid_crossing = false;
113  if(mid_line_validation_table_[mid_line_validation_table_.size()-1].GetLabel() > 0)
114  {
115  for(auto it: mid_line_validation_table_)
116  {
117  if( it.GetDirection()>340 || it.GetDirection() < 20 || (it.GetDirection() < 200 && it.GetDirection() > 160))
118  {
119  mid_crossing = true;
120  //crossing_score++;
121  }
122  }
123  }
124  //cout << "Cscore: " << crossing_score << endl;
125 
126 
127  int crossing_score = 0;
128 
129  bool left_crossing = false;
130  if(left_line_validation_table_.size()>0)
131  {
132 
133  int tmp_direction = left_line_validation_table_[0].GetDirection();
134 
135 
136  for(int i=0; i<left_line_validation_table_.size(); i++)
137  {
138  if( left_line_validation_table_[i].GetOriginPoint().y < 220) break;
139  int current_direction = left_line_validation_table_[i].GetDirection();
140  int direction_difference = abs(current_direction - tmp_direction);
141 
142  if(direction_difference > 80)// && (360 - 80) < direction_difference)
143  {
144  if(current_direction > 140 && current_direction < 220)
145  { left_crossing = true;
146  break;
147  }
148  }
149  tmp_direction = current_direction;
150  }
151 
152  }
153 
154 
155  bool right_crossing = false;
156  if(right_line_validation_table_.size()>0)
157  {
158 
159  int tmp_direction = right_line_validation_table_[0].GetDirection();
160 
161 
162  for(int i=0; i<right_line_validation_table_.size(); i++)
163  {
164  if( right_line_validation_table_[i].GetOriginPoint().y < 220) break;
165  int current_direction = right_line_validation_table_[i].GetDirection();
166  int direction_difference = abs(current_direction - tmp_direction);
167 
168  if(direction_difference > 80)// || (360 - 80) < direction_difference)
169  {
170  if(current_direction > 320 || current_direction < 40)
171  { right_crossing = true;
172  break;
173  }
174  }
175  tmp_direction = current_direction;
176  }
177 
178  }
179 
180  MinMaxLineElements left_line_minmax_elements_;
181  MinMaxLineElements right_line_minmax_elements_;
182 
183  ExtractMinMaxLineElements(left_line_points_in_drive_direction_ , left_line_minmax_elements_ );
184  ExtractMinMaxLineElements(right_line_points_in_drive_direction_, right_line_minmax_elements_ );
185 
186  bool left_ymin_is_small = left_line_minmax_elements_.y_min.y > 250;
187  bool right_y_min_is_small = right_line_minmax_elements_.y_min.y > 250;
188  bool left_size_is_small = left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() < 150;
189  bool right_size_is_small = right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size()< 150 ;
190 
191  //if (left_line_minmax_elements_.y_min.y > 250) cout << "lmin" << endl;
192  //if (right_line_minmax_elements_.y_min.y > 250) cout << "rmin" << endl;
193 
194 
195 
196 
197  bool crossing = false;
198 
199  if(left_crossing && right_crossing && mid_crossing && left_ymin_is_small && right_y_min_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "lrm_ls_rs crossing" << endl;
200  cout << left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
201  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
202  crossing= true;}
203  else if(left_crossing && mid_crossing && left_ymin_is_small && right_y_min_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "lm_ls_rs crossing" << endl;
204  cout << left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
205  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
206  crossing= true;}
207  else if(right_crossing && mid_crossing && left_ymin_is_small && right_y_min_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "rm_ls_rs crossing" << endl;
208  cout << left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
209  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
210  crossing= true;}
211  else if (left_crossing && right_crossing && left_ymin_is_small && right_y_min_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "lr_ls_rs crossing" << endl;
212  cout << left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
213  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
214  crossing= true;}
215  else if (right_crossing && mid_crossing && right_y_min_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "rm_rs crossing" << endl;
216  cout << left_line_validation_table_.size() << endl;
217  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
218  crossing= true;}
219  else if(mid_crossing && right_y_min_is_small && left_ymin_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "m_ls_rs crossing" << endl;
220  cout << left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
221  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
222  crossing= true;}
223  else if(mid_crossing && left_ymin_is_small && left_size_is_small && right_size_is_small){ cout << "m_ls crossing" << endl;
224  cout << left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;

229  cout << right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size() << endl;
230  crossing= true;}
231

235  {

285 
286 
287 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::ExtractLinePointsInDriveDirection(vector<LineValidationTable>& line_validation_table, vector<LineValidationTable>& line_points_in_drive_direction )
288 {
289 
290  // only take line points which have low change in direction
291  // if they have then theres an issue like a cross section
292 
293  if(line_validation_table.size()>0)
294  {
295  int cut_off_id = 0;
296  bool cut_off = false;
297 
298  int tmp_direction = line_validation_table[0].GetDirection();
299 
300  if(tmp_direction > kMinStartDirection_ && tmp_direction < kMaxStartDirection_)
301  {
302  for(int i=0; i<line_validation_table.size(); i++)
303  {
304  int current_direction = line_validation_table[i].GetDirection();
305  int direction_difference = abs(current_direction - tmp_direction);
306 
307  if(direction_difference > kMaxDirectionDifference_ || (360 - kMaxDirectionDifference_) < direction_difference)
308  {
309  cut_off_id = i;
310  cut_off = true;
311  break;
312  }
313  tmp_direction = current_direction;
314  }
315 
316  if(cut_off)
317  {
318  for(int i=0; i<cut_off_id; i++) line_points_in_drive_direction.emplace_back(line_validation_table[i]);
319  }
320  else{
321  copy(line_validation_table.begin(), line_validation_table.end(), back_inserter(line_points_in_drive_direction));
322  }
323  }
324  }
325 }
326 
327 
328 //void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::FindSafestPointsOnTrack
329 
330 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::DrawLinePointsInDriveDirection(Mat &rgb)
331 {
332 
333 
334  for(int i=0; i<left_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size(); i++)
335  {
336 
337  circle(rgb, left_line_points_in_drive_direction_[i].GetOriginPoint(), 1, Scalar(0, 255, 255),CV_FILLED );
338 
339  }
340 
341  for(int i=0; i<mid_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size(); i++)
342  {
343 
344  circle(rgb, mid_line_points_in_drive_direction_[i].GetOriginPoint(), 1, Scalar(255, 0, 255),CV_FILLED );
345 
346  }
347 
348  for(int i=0; i<right_line_points_in_drive_direction_.size(); i++)
349  {
350 
351  circle(rgb, right_line_points_in_drive_direction_[i].GetOriginPoint(), 1, Scalar(255, 255, 0),CV_FILLED );
352 
353  }

357 
358 
359 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::ExtractMinMaxLineElements( vector<LineValidationTable> line, MinMaxLineElements& line_minmax_elements )
360 {
361 
362  if(line.size() > 0)
363  {
364  auto x_it = minmax_element(begin(line),end(line),
365  [&](LineValidationTable& line_point1, LineValidationTable& line_point2)
366  {
367  return line_point1.GetOriginPoint().x < line_point2.GetOriginPoint().x;
368  });
369 
370  auto y_it = minmax_element(begin(line),end(line),
371  [&](LineValidationTable& line_point1, LineValidationTable& line_point2)
372  {
373  return line_point1.GetOriginPoint().y < line_point2.GetOriginPoint().y;
374  });
375 
376  int x_min_id = std::distance(line.begin(), x_it.first);
377  int x_max_id = std::distance(line.begin(), x_it.second);
378  int y_min_id = std::distance(line.begin(), y_it.first);
379  int y_max_id = std::distance(line.begin(), y_it.second);
380 
381  line_minmax_elements = MinMaxLineElements{line[x_min_id].GetOriginPoint(),
382  line[x_max_id].GetOriginPoint(),
383  line[y_min_id].GetOriginPoint(),
384  line[y_max_id].GetOriginPoint(),
385  true};
386  }
387 }
388

390 void LineValidationTableFeatureExtraction::ExtractLastMatchingPoints(vector<LineValidationTable> line_validation_table_,
391  vector<LineValidationTable> line_direction_in_range_,
392  int LINE_CODE)
